name: 宇宙大拍扁 / BIG BIA
description:
After "BIGBIA," the whole universe is smashed to pieces...

With the demise of the old age and the birth of a era, a mysterious substance called Voxel emerged and became an important cornerstone for remaking the rules of the universe. Lead your Party to explore this strange and mysterious universe, face the challenge and gradually become stronger, discover its secrets and open a new era. Comprehend the ultimate secret of the universe being beaten flat, become the most powerful creator of the entire universe!

Now, our expedition team is going to hold an early access. Players interested in exploring the mysterious universe of Big BIA in advance are welcome to join the official Discord and become the first creators to explore the universe of Big BIA!

The Great Prophesy



  • Before BIGBIA, mysterious prophets had predicted that the universe would be flattened.

Voxel



  • The matter appeared after the big bia, the key to the restoration of the universe.

Exploration





  • Deserted streets of depravity, deserts filled with deadly dangers, from abandoned cities to tropical forests, embark random dungeons when you collect specific scenes through your adventures.
  • Each time you enter the dungeon, all the elements collected will be randomly mixed in a certain proportion, creating a unique challenge!
  • Giant trees, serpents, and even the old ones hide in every scene, vanquish them, and learn the ultimate secrets of the world.

Universe Press



  • In addition to the latest news, it will also come with a lot of strange items that can be accessed directly!

Minions



  • You can make combinations from 70 or so of your base Minions and devour them to create what you consider a powerful lineup.
  • Each Minion has a unique tricolor skill, red for strength, yellow for fortitude and blue for wisdom.

Devour





  • Nothing in the world of Big Bia can't be devoured.
  • All things devour each other, it is the core of the game.
  • You can strengthen your minions and items by devouring them.
  • Devouring everything and recreating the world is the ultimate way of piecing together everything to repair the universe.

Combat



  • Combat mainly take place in 3*3 squared box, how to balance the number of minions, strategies and when to devour them requires a lot of thinking.
  • Combos are encouraged in battle. Powerful active abilities consumes the corresponding number of energy points before it can be used.

Taboos and Worships



  • Because of the power of Voxels, most scenes are marked by taboos and worships. When your behavior or skill violates the taboo, you are inevitably punished or the other way around if you follow the worship.

Daily updates



  • With each update comes a new big theme, with new scenes, new minions, and new monsters.
  • It will also spawn new events and small theaters, some inspired by whimsical imaginations, others inspired by everyday life, and yes, some of the realities of parallel universe will be replayed in a different form in Big Bia.

Creative Workshop



  • It is expected to open six months after the game release, so players interested in creating their own unique toys should pay more attention.

Versus





  • When there is enough gameplay content, we will launch the cosmic ranking project.

In addition, we have a lot of things planned, many of which have already completed the basic framework. Big BIA's new Universe will never stop!
